ygData.subject: Re: Task system
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, I m a new member with a couple of comments on the new task system.  I have a full compliment of alts on the Maelyn Starpyre server and was playing
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings, I'm a new member with a couple of comments on the new
task system. I have a full compliment of alts on the Maelyn
Starpyre server and was playing with my little cleric (lvl 25) the
other day. I started a task and got booted from the net when my net
security picked up someone trying to get on my system. I had
collected all of my objects and was working on my kills for the
task. I lost all of the objects and the kills. I got back on and
found that. I tried again later that night and did not finish before
I got to tired to play. Again, it was all gone when I logged back
on. So tasks have to be finished before you log or get booted. I'm
laughing about it now but at the time it was very frustrating.

Misteria
Paladin of Norrath
Nanianya
Sister of Misteria, Ranger of Norrath
Carillion
Sister to Misteria and Healer to All Norrathians

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@e...>
wrote:
> I tried one task. There are 3 Task Masters in POK. And I believe
at least 1 in every home town. Just hail them. They will give you
a list of tasks to choose from. Rezize your task window to see the
rewards. These tasks are not easily soloable, but if you get a
group you can finish them fairly quickly. My first task was to
collect 4 bone chips and kill 10 reanimated mobs in Chardok. It
took awhile but it was good xp and a 58pp reward.
>
> Raido
>
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Chris
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 2004 1:54 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Task system
>
>
> I just got Omens of War, and I've been trying to find
information
> about the new task system. Has anyone here tried it out yet? Are
the
> tasks easily soloable?
>
> Chris
